testsuite.name: com.emp.testcases.RolesPermissionTest
testsuite.system-out: Step1 . clicked on Sttings Module and Selected Roles-And-Permission Sub-module Step2 . clicked on Add New-Role Button Step3 . clicked on Role-name Test field and Entered Role Name Step4 . clicked on Location Drop-down and Selected Location Step5 . clicked on Department Drop-down and Select Department Step6 . clicked on save Button Step7 . clicked on Last-page Button Step8 . clicked write_CheckBox Step9 . clicked on Delete Check Box Step10 . clicked on Settings Step11 . clicked on Employee-Website-usage Button Step12. selected All option (check-box ) Step13. clicked on save Button
